mapper.select: SELECT dm.devices_manage_id, dt.name, dm.manage_code, dm.model_name FROM devices_manage dm LEFT JOIN devices_type dt ON dm.devices_type_id=dt.devices_type_id WHERE dm.devices_type_id=#{devices_type_id} AND dm.devices_manage_id<>#{devices_manage_id} AND dm.delete_flg=0 AND dm.status IN(1,4)

SELECT tm.tools_manage_id, tm.tool_name AS tools_name, tm.manage_code, tm.tools_no, sec.name as section_name, pos.process_code FROM tools_manage tm LEFT JOIN section sec ON sec.section_id = tm.section_id LEFT JOIN position pos ON pos.position_id = tm.position_id WHERE tm.tools_no=#{tools_no} AND tm.tools_manage_id<>#{tools_manage_id} AND tm.delete_flg=0 AND tm.status IN(1,4)

SELECT cur.check_unqualified_record_key, cur.manage_id, cur.happen_time, cur.line_leader_id, cur.object_type, COALESCE(dm.manage_code,tm.manage_code,'') AS manage_code, COALESCE(dt.name,tm.tool_name,'') AS name, dm.model_name, cur.check_item, cur.unqualified_status, cur.product_content, cur.position_handle, cur.object_handle, cur.repair_date_start, cur.repair_date_end, cur.borrow_object_id, cur.alarm_message_id, cur.technology_comment, responsible_op.name AS responsible_operator_name, line_op.name AS line_leader_name, manager_op.name AS manager_name, cur.line_leader_handle_time, cur.manager_handle_time, cur.object_final_handle_result, cur.product_result, COALESCE(borrow_dt.name,borrow_tm.tool_name,'') AS borrow_object_name, borrow_dm.model_name AS borrow_model_name, COALESCE(borrow_dm.manage_code, borrow_tm.manage_code) AS borrow_manage_no, tm.tools_no FROM check_unqualified_record cur LEFT JOIN devices_manage dm ON cur.manage_id=dm.devices_manage_id AND cur.object_type=1 LEFT JOIN devices_type dt ON dt.devices_type_id=dm.devices_type_id LEFT JOIN tools_manage tm ON cur.manage_id=tm.tools_manage_id AND cur.object_type=2 LEFT JOIN operator responsible_op ON cur.responsible_operator_id=responsible_op.operator_id LEFT JOIN operator line_op ON cur.line_leader_id=line_op.operator_id LEFT JOIN operator manager_op ON cur.manager_id=manager_op.operator_id LEFT JOIN devices_manage borrow_dm ON cur.borrow_object_id=borrow_dm.devices_manage_id AND cur.object_type=1 LEFT JOIN devices_type borrow_dt ON borrow_dm.devices_type_id=borrow_dt.devices_type_id LEFT JOIN tools_manage borrow_tm ON cur.borrow_object_id=borrow_tm.tools_manage_id AND cur.object_type=2 WHERE cur.check_unqualified_record_key=#{check_unqualified_record_key}
